column5: This peaceful and comfy home is a great place to relax with all the comforts of home. Enjoy the greenbelt system of 70+ miles of wooded trails for walking or cycling, stop by one of many family owned restaurants from a casual fresh bagel shop to fine dining on the waterfront. My Home is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. Lots of privacy, full kitchen and quiet places to sit.
column8: Guest room with private bath in Kingwood home.
